Class to connect with the platform

  • Constructor Details

    • KaaConnector

      public KaaConnector()

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public static java.lang.String connect​(java.lang.String url) throws java.lang.Exception
      Class that try to get connected with the Kaa platform through the Kaa API
      Parameters:
      url - Url to be added to the KAA_EPTS_API_BASE_URL
      Returns:
      The JSON given by Kaa if it could connect. Error otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - If something goes wrong (Malformed URL, Couldn't estabilish a connection with Kaa, Couldn't connect with the platform)

    • connect

      public static java.lang.Object[] connect() throws org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttException
      Function to connect the API to the Kaa MQTT Server
      Returns:
      Array of 2 objects: in the first place an instance of MqttClient, in the second one an instance of MqttConnectOptions
      Throws:
      org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttException - If is not possible to get connected with the Kaa MQTT server

    • connect

      public static boolean connect​(org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttConnectOptions connOpts, org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttClient mqttClient) throws java.lang.Exception
      Function to reconnect to the Kaa MQTT Server to be sure that the connection hasn't been lost
      Parameters:
      connOpts - instance of MqttConnectOptions
      mqttClient - instance of MqttClient
      Returns:
      true if the API can reconnect to the Kaa MQTT Server, error otherwise
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - If is not possible to get connected with the Kaa MQTT server
